title: Bug 6536 - Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
OB: When selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu of a field in the TH, nothing happens. The expected behavior is that the action should add the Javadoc to the field.
EB: From its context menu, selecting 'Add Javadoc' should add the Javadoc to the field. Alternatively, the 'Add Javadoc' option can be removed from the context menu.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open the TH. 2. Right-click on a field. 3. Select 'Add Javadoc' from the context menu. 4. Verify that nothing happens and the Javadoc is not added to the field.
